title: Elegant Escape in Nainital with Fantastic Dining Inclusions
description: Whisk your loved one away for an Escapes Club getaway in stunning Nainital at The Manu Maharani Resort & Spa. Hidden away in the Kumaon Hills, you will enjoy a tranquil retreat thanks to The Manu Maharani’s excellent hospitality, beautiful décor and incredible views of the Nainital Valley with its emerald lake. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, daily buffet dinner, daily high tea, one cocktail, beer or glass of wine every evening and complimentary Wi-Fi.
offer_address: Grassmere Estate, Mallital, Ayarpatta, Nainital, Uttarakhand 263001, India
